title: Mainframe Dispatch Workflow (Full)
summary: Step-by-step screenshot walkthrough for dispatching tasks on Mainframe X.

screenshots.caption: Start and verify VPN connection (blur sensitive IDs).
Open Terminal and SSH to mainframe.example.com. Do not paste passwords.
From the main menu, choose Operations → Dispatch.
Enter dispatch info. Use the dropdown to select yard code.

usageTips: Redact or blur personal/credential data in images
Use the checklist before performing changes
notes: Put images under Assets/StreamingAssets/JobTemplate/screenshots/. The loader will log missing images instead of throwing errors.
